mathematical operations
[function for approximation (wfunc)]


Functions

REAL surfit::wfunc_getValue (REAL x, REAL y)
 calculates wfunction value at point (x,y)
bool surfit::wfunc_add_noise (REAL std)
 adds normally-distributed noise with parameters N(0,std) to coeff
REAL surfit::wfunc_minz ()
 calculates minimum value of Z for surfit_wfunc
REAL surfit::wfunc_maxz ()
 calculates maximum value of Z for surfit_wfunc
REAL surfit::wfunc_mean ()
 calculates mean value of Z for surfit_wfunc

 calculates standard deviation from mean value of Z for surfit_wfunc
bool surfit::wfunc_plus (wfunc *fnc)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc + fnc. wfunctions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::wfunc_minus (wfunc *fnc)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc - fnc. wfunctions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::wfunc_mult (wfunc *fnc)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc * fnc. wfunctions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::wfunc_div (wfunc *fnc)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc / fnc. wfunctions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::wfunc_set (wfunc *fnc)
 surfit_wfunc = fnc. wfunctions sizes must be equal
bool surfit::wfunc_plus_real (REAL val)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc + val
bool surfit::wfunc_mult_real (REAL val)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc * val
bool surfit::wfunc_div_real (REAL val)
 surfit_wfunc = surfit_wfunc / val
bool surfit::wfunc_set_real (REAL val)
 surfit_wfunc = val
